54
THE EXPENSES FOR SUPPORTING AN HEIR
(1) That which was used to support an heir and for his or her obligatory education shall not be included in his or her hereditary portion.
(2) The court shall decide whether and to what extent the expenses the decedent had to meet for the further education of an heir shall be included in his or her hereditary portion, taking into account the relevant circumstances, mainly the value of the estate and the expenses of education and providing the means for ensuring independent life to other heirs.
